It helps to collectively put our thumb on the scale towards a more sustainable future. That's our hope. That's our aspiration."
Rajiv Shah, president of the Rockefeller Foundation

articles.description: As the possibility of no Brexit deal continues to loom, UK firms are stockpiling and putting pressure on already pandemic-pressed ports. CNN's Anna Stewart meets some of the truck drivers waiting hours in line as well as a company taking a different approach.
